name: Nightlight (Month Jam)
description:
Nightlight is a short top-down adventure, where you are a monster scared of the dark. Using your light you must navigate through the dungeon and escape to the surface!

CONTROLS:

WASD = Move

Holding Space/Mouse = Shoot

Release Space/Mouse = Grow Light

  • 10 Levels
  • Interesting Mechanics
  • Spooky Monster!

This was a submission for Month Jam June 2022
